overview:
Victor Wong is the Chief Executive Officer and Founder of PaperG, a locally focused online advertising technology company. PaperG helps leading online publishers including Hearst Newspapers, The Boston Globe, and mtvU monetize their sites by capturing untapped ad revenue in the markets they serve.

The company recently was named a 2010 OnMedia 100 winner for its “game-changing” and “disruptive” approach to the media and advertising industries.

Wong was recently named co-chairperson of the Interactive Advertising Bureauâ€™s (IAB) Local Committee. He has been a lecturer and speaker at events hosted by NYU, CUNY Graduate School of Journalism, NAA as well as BIA Kelsey. PaperG has been featured in Forbes, paidContent, MediaPost, Editor & Publisher, ClickZ, among many others.

Wong was an undergraduate at Yale University where he studied economics, and he is currently a Yale Entrepreneurial Institute Fellow.
